numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The graph is about communicating with parents.
3. Young men are less likely to reach out to a parent than young women.
4. I wonder why men are less likely to reach out to a parent than women.
5. I wonder what the age range of the respondents is.
6. This situation has a great impact on me.
7. This situation has a great impact on my community.
8. People in my community have relationships with their parents.
9. I have a relationship with my parents.
10. The headline is: Got mail? Communicating with parents.
